attributes.action: have local public votes on all big council decisions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to ask to put all big council decisions to local vote, case and point - local laws, recently we have had the 'recycle' bins forced upon our area, i dont remember ever being given the choice, also the smoking ban, when did we vote that in ?. it seems to me that we are being told what to do and not asked what we want to do - the last time i checked, this was a democracy not a dictatorship.
